bibl.title: Two Coptic Legal Ostraca.

Coptic Society, Literature and Religion from Late Antiquity to Modern Times. Proceedings of the Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012 and Plenary Reports of the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. I; - II

bibl.note: 1. O. Cair. Inv. SR 18953 (37). Promise to repay a loan of mat(s). Provenance unknown, 7th-8th cent. AD. - 2. Inv. SR 18953 (99). Promise to repay a loan of something measured in artaba. Provenance unknown, 7th-8th cent. AD.
bibl.seg: Sohair S. Ahmed, Two Coptic Legal Ostraca.

Paola Buzi, Alberto Camplani & Federico Contardi (edd.), Coptic Society, Literature and Religion from Late Antiquity to Modern Times. Proceedings of the Tenth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Rome, September 17th-22nd, 2012 and Plenary Reports of the Ninth International Congress of Coptic Studies, Cairo, September 15th-19th, 2008. II = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 247 (Leuven - Paris - Bristol, CT, 2016) pp. 1317-1322, 2 figg.

1. O. Cair. Inv. SR 18953 (37). Promise to repay a loan of mat(s). Provenance unknown, 7th-8th cent. AD. - 2. Inv. SR 18953 (99). Promise to repay a loan of something measured in artaba. Provenance unknown, 7th-8th cent. AD.
